start.intro: Please fill in the admin password of the Netgear router. Change the other defaults if needed.
start.title: Add device

settings.title: Netgear App
settings.instructions:
If you have troubles with the app, you can perform a compatibility test. The result can be used to improve the app.
Enter the password of the router, and optionally the IP address. Then start the test. Wiyh the 'Copy' button you can create an issue
